DOC.criteria: Female Between 18 75 year age Confirmed pure genuine stress incontinence Have discrete episode incontinence Have pelvic organ prolapse great Stage II Positive urine culture visit 1 Had formal PFMT instruction Use MAOI exclude medication Use antiincontinence device , vaginal pessary medication prescribe treatment urinary incontinence
